pageTitle: Rep. John M Spratt Jr: Campaign Finance/Money - Summary - Representative 2008 | OpenSecrets
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {7321=NOTE: All the numbers on this page are for the 2007-2008 election cycle and based on Federal Election Commission data available electronically on January 06, 2010 (for Fundraising totals, Source of Funds and Total Raised vs Average) and on March 11, 2013 for Top Contributors and Industries. In the "Source of Funds" chart, "Large Individual Contributions" refer to all contributions from unique individuals aggregating to more than $200 within a cycle, and "Small Individual Contributions" refer to all contributions from unique individuals totaling $200 or less within a cycle.
